text:
<quote> fom
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/apr-dev/200207.mbox/raw/%3c029701c22521$00e2fea0$0a01230a@KOJ%3e
"BTW, I should also mention that the APR_POLL_LASTDESC enum is only there
for backwards compat.  Most code that uses apr_poll would never use that
enum."
</quote>

Marking it as deprecated explicitly in the API doc would be best.
aka something of the following sort:
-    APR_POLL_LASTDESC           /**< descriptor is the last one in the list */
+    APR_POLL_LASTDESC           /**< descriptor is the last one in the list
(here only for backwards compatibility, should not be used) */
creator: lucian.grijincu@avira.com

text:
Created attachment 19389
fixes the documentation by marking the enum value deprecated
creator: lucian.grijincu@avira.com

text:
@deprecated is what you ment - something worth addressing but that I don't have
cycles for this moment.
